interestingFact: Brazil is the Amazon Rainforest, the largest tropical in the world.
India is the world's largest democracy by population.
Japan is made up of over 6,800 islands.
Australia is the only continent covered by a single country.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world's lakes combined.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris was once the tallest man-made structure in the world.
Russia is the largest country in the world by area.
Egypt is  Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.
Germany is known for its engineering and automotive industry.
